   10000000.00000000.00000000.00000000  IP Network: 128.0.0.0
   10000000.00000000.00000000.00000001  IP Gateway convenzionale: 128.0.0.1
   11111111.11110000.00000000.00000000  Subnet Mask: 255.240.0.0

   Bits per Host: 20
   Max hosts: 1048576
